trans-unit.source: Provides data for callbacks that are invoked when a XAML writer sets a value using a type converter call.
Callbacks for type converter usages use the <xref:System.EventHandler%601> delegate, with <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterEventArgs> event data constraint.
trans-unit.target: I callback per l'utilizzo di tipo del convertitore utilizzi il <xref:System.EventHandler%601> delegare, con <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterEventArgs> vincolo dati degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: Callbacks for type converter usages are referenced by <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterAttribute> applied at the class level (for example on <xref:System.Windows.Setter> class in WPF).
trans-unit.target: Callback per gli utilizzi di convertitore di tipo fa riferimento <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterAttribute> applicata a livello di classe (ad esempio in <xref:System.Windows.Setter> classe in WPF).

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker> might also reference a callback through the <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker.SetTypeConverterHandler%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto personalizzato <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker> può anche fare riferimento a un callback tramite il <xref:System.Xaml.Schema.XamlTypeInvoker.SetTypeConverterHandler%2A> valore.

trans-unit.source: XAML type system / schema information for the member being set.
The specific type converter instance being invoked.
The value to provide for the member being set.
Service provider information that can be used by the <c>typeConverter</c> class.

Culture information that can be used by the <c>typeConverter</c> class when calling <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object)" /> and other methods.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlSetTypeConverterEventArgs" /> class.
Provides a way to invoke a callback as defined on a base class of the current acting type.

Gets <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> information that can be used by the type converter class when calling <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertFrom(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object)" /> and other methods.
Culture information that can be used by the type converter class
trans-unit.target: Informazioni sulle impostazioni cultura che possono essere utilizzate dalla classe del convertitore di tipi

trans-unit.source: Gets <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> information that can be used by the type converter class.
Service provider information that can be used by the <paramref name="typeConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni sui provider che può essere utilizzati da servizi di <paramref name="typeConverter" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter" /> instance that is invoked and provides type conversion behavior.
The type converter that provides type conversion behavior.
trans-unit.target: Il convertitore di tipi che fornisce il comportamento di conversione.
